## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Tests update
- [ ] CI/CD update
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed all console.logs and debug statements

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] New and existing E2E tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on different browsers (if UI changes)
- [ ] I have tested on mobile devices (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated Storybook stories (for UI components)
- [ ] I have updated the README (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md

### Accessibility

- [ ] I have tested keyboard navigation
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels
- [ ] I have tested with a screen reader (if applicable)
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards

### Performance

- [ ] My changes don't negatively impact performance
- [ ] I have optimized images (if applicable)
- [ ] I have minimized bundle size impact

### Security

- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have validated user inputs (if applicable)
- [ ] I haven't exposed sensitive data

## Breaking Changes

If this PR introduces breaking changes, please describe them here and update the CHANGELOG.md accordingly.
